item.title: You Won't Believe How Easy it is to Temporarily Close Your Facebook Account!
item.description: Introduction Are you feeling overwhelmed by the amount of time you spend on social media? Do you want to take a break from all the notifications, messages, and updates? Then you should consider temporarily closing your Facebook account! Definition of Temporarily Closing a Facebook Account Temporarily closing your Facebook account means you are deactivating your account for a certain amount of time. This means that your profile, photos, posts, and any other information associated with your account will be hidden from view.
